context.name: Pulsar Quantum Lite XQ23V Thermal Imaging Scope
context.excerpt: The Pulsar Quantum Lite XQ23V Thermal Imaging Scope offers unmatched performance at its price point.
context.content:
The Pulsar Quantum Lite XQ23V Thermal Imaging Scope has all the features found on the previous Quantum XQ Series but has a new objective lens. The Quantum Lite now offers unmatched performance at its price point.

Operating at a frame rate of 50Hz and using a 384x288 17Âµm thermal sensor, the Quantum Lite produces a smooth, detailed image.

Pulsar Quantum Lite XQ23V Thermal Imaging Scope Features:

High Frame Rate
Stadiametric Rangefinder
Wide Temperature Range
Display-off Mode
Long Detection Range
7 Colour Palettes
Two Second Start-Up Time
Three Calibration Modes
Three Operating Modes
Video Out Port
Weaver Accessory Rail
Power Saving Modes
Frost-Resistant AMOLED display
